title: Player Head Drops
description_short: Drop player heads when exploded by a charged Creeper or player
description: Players will drop their head when killed by a charged Creeper or a slim chance when killed by a Player, alternative pack for dropping a head only when killed by a charged Creeper

features.label: Player heads will drop when killed by a charged Creeper. Player heads have a rare chance of being dropped when killed by another player
Alternate version for drops ONLY from charged Creepers
Compatible with Minecraft 1.13 and up, last tested on Minecraft 1.20
